bioAsHtml: Christian Wirth is a Software Development Manager at Oracle Labs, based in Linz, Austria. He is responsible for the Graal/Truffle based JavaScript implementation called Graal.JS. Christian received a PhD in Computer Science from Johannes Kepler University, Austria. He joined Oracle Labs in 2013.

acceptedTalks.title: Graal.JS - high-performance JavaScript on the JVM

bio: Christian Wirth is a Software Development Manager at Oracle Labs, based in Linz, Austria. He is responsible for the Graal/Truffle based JavaScript implementation called Graal.JS. Christian received a PhD in Computer Science from Johannes Kepler University, Austria. He joined Oracle Labs in 2013.
